definition: an old name for Nanjing, called Jiankang 建康 or Jianye during the Eastern Jin (317-420)
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Jianye is not able to locate her, and is unaware that Qiuhua has gone home to confess.
sentences.chinese: 建業到處找不到秋樺，卻不知秋樺已自己回家認錯。

sentences.english: Chili hose jian-ye liu to bubble hot spring, jian-ye liu compliment on the way.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒水帶着劉建業來泡溫泉，劉建業一路恭維。

sentences.english: Chili hose jian-ye liu to bubble hot spring, jian-ye liu compliment on the way.
sentences.chinese: 辣椒水帶着劉建業來泡溫泉，劉建業一路恭維。

sentences.english: But at this time, Jianye inflection point.
sentences.chinese: 但在這個時候，建業拐點。

sentences.english: The construction industry has been badly hurt by nationalisation.
sentences.chinese: 營建業已經在收歸國有的過程受傷慘重。

sentences.english: During these times it was known by the names Jianye and Jiankang .
sentences.chinese: 在這些時候，是已知的名字建業和建康。

definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration

vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
